Reviews.Title: robust  & dependable cell phone...used for 5 long years.
Reviews.Author: umesh
Reviews.Content: It very dependable, robust. I have been using this reggularly all 5 years. I never found any model as robust. It very simple to operate.

ProductInfo.Features:
Modes; GSM 850 / GSM 1800 / GSM 1900
Bluetooth Supported Profiles: HFP, DUN, OPP, FTP
WAP / Web Browser; supports WML, xHTML, plus full HTML with mutliple formatting options
Email Client Protocols Supported: SMTP, POP3, IMAP4
Camera Resolution: VGA (640 x 480) self-timer, digital zoom, and night mode functions
ProductInfo.Name: NOKIA 6620 GSM VIDEO PHONE CINGULAR ATT AT&T UNLOCKED
